page.title: 10TOURISM -BROADFORD
page.content: In the Isle of Skye each Bed and Breakfast season (sixteen weeks) four thousand eight hundred{tourists arrive in Broadford.Each week roughly three hundred tourists visit the village and out of all the tourists that come to Broadford each year, about two thousand,nine hundred of them come from the United States. Roughly 2 500 people visit twice a year because at first they usually only spend a long weekend or a few days and they return later to see more of the scenery. In the survey area there are 30 Bed & Breakfast houses,i.e.13 in Broadford,8 in Harapul,4 in Waterloo and 5in Breakish but there are many,many others that are not registered with {Tourist Information.}There is three hotels in the area,The Broadford,The Dunollie and The Hebridean.
